remarks: Axiom of Continuity.  Axiom A11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 13. For more information see ~ axtgcont1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Mar-2019.)
statement:
axtrkg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
axtrkg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
axtrkg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
axtrkg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
axtgcont.1 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ P ) $.
axtgcont.2 $e |- ( ph -> T C_ P ) $.
axtgcont.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
axtgcont.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ u e. S /\ v e. T ) -> u e. ( A I v ) ) $.
axtgcont $p |- ( ph -> E. b e. P A. x e. S A. y e. T b e. ( x I y ) ) $.
$d .- b u v x y $.
$d A b u v x y $.
$d I b u v x y $.
$d P b u v x y $.
$d S b u v x $.
$d T b u v x y $.
$d b u v $.
$d b u v $.
$d b u v x y $.
$d b u v y $.
$d b v $.
$d b v $.
$d ph u v $.
$d x y $.
